com.dooapp.gaedo.blueprints.transformers
Class DateLiteralTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.dooapp.gaedo.blueprints.transformers.AbstractLiteralTransformer<Type>
      com.dooapp.gaedo.blueprints.transformers.AbstractSimpleLiteralTransformer<Date>
          com.dooapp.gaedo.blueprints.transformers.DateLiteralTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
LiteralTransformer<Date>, Transformer
public class DateLiteralTransformer
extends AbstractSimpleLiteralTransformer<Date>
implements LiteralTransformer<Date>

As SimpleDateFormat is not thread-safe and construction heavy, see here (http: //www.jmdoudoux.fr/java/dej/chap-utilisation_dates.htm#utilisation_dates-3) for the why of this pattern Furthermore, used pattern is ISO standard (see there : http://www.fileformat.info/tip/java/simpledateformat.htm)

Author:
ndx
